greeting.explain: HopeWell connects blood donors to those fighting for survival. Every donation you make becomes someone's second chance.

messsage.welcome: Welcome to the Blood Donation System
messsage.error_occurred: An error occurred, please try again later.

about.page_subtitle: Learn about our mission, vision and core values

vision.title: Vision
content: To become Vietnam's leading blood donation center, pioneering the application of modern technology to efficiently manage and distribute blood, ensuring a safe and adequate blood supply for the whole society.
We aim to build a sustainable blood donation system where every citizen can easily participate in humanitarian blood donation activities, helping to save millions of patients' lives.

mission.title: Mission
content: Connecting compassionate hearts with those in need through organizing professional, safe and effective blood donation activities.
We are committed to providing high-quality blood donation services, ensuring scientific and absolutely safe procedures for blood donors, while managing blood sources transparently and efficiently.

core_values.title: Core Values
core_values.subtitle: The values that guide and shape all our activities in our development journey

values.title: Dedication
values.description: We always prioritize the safety and health of blood donors, delivering every service with wholehearted dedication and meticulous care.

values.title: Professionalism
values.description: Our team of highly experienced doctors, internationally standardized procedures, and modern equipment ensure the highest service quality.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: All activities are conducted transparently and openly, safeguarding the rights and trust of blood donors.

values.title: Efficiency
values.description: The spirit of compassion and sharing drives us to continuously strive for the health of the community.

homePage.Name: Blood Donation Management System
homePage.Description: Connecting blood donors with those in need, efficiently managing resources and the donation process
homePage.Step1Desc: Fill in your information and undergo initial health screening
homePage.Step2Desc: Get a basic health check and blood test
homePage.Step3Desc: The blood donation process takes about 10–15 minutes
homePage.DonorQuote: Donating blood not only helps others but also makes me feel more useful. HopeWell always provides the best support for donors.
homePage.RecipientQuote: Thanks to the blood from HopeWell, I survived a critical surgery. Thank you to all the donors who saved my life.
homePage.CTA_Title: You Can Save a Life Today
homePage.CTA_Description: Just 15 minutes of donating blood can give 3 people a chance to live

header.no_blogs: It looks like there are no articles related to your search

header.author: Author

footer.about: A system connecting blood donors and recipients, ensuring safe, sufficient, and timely blood supplies.
footer.address: 123 Medical Street, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City
footer.subscribe_info: Subscribe to receive the latest information about blood donation campaigns and emergency news.

blood_compatibility.title: Blood Compatibility Lookup
blood_compatibility.subtitle: Check compatibility between blood types and blood components
blood_compatibility.select_blood_type_notice: Please select a blood type to view results
blood_compatibility.info_1: • O- is a universal donor (can donate to all blood types)
blood_compatibility.info_2: • AB+ is a universal recipient (can receive from all blood types)
blood_compatibility.info_3: • Rh-negative can donate to Rh-positive, but not the other way around

whole_blood.name: Whole Blood
whole_blood.description: Whole blood contains all the components of blood, including red blood cells, white blood cells, platelets, and plasma.

red_blood_cells.name: Red Blood Cells
red_blood_cells.description: Red blood cells carry oxygen from the lungs to tissues throughout the body. Essential in treating anemia.

platelets.name: Platelets
platelets.description: Platelets help blood clot and prevent bleeding. Commonly used in cancer treatments.

plasma.name: Plasma
plasma.description: Plasma is the liquid part of blood, containing proteins and nutrients. Important for treating burns and shock.

donationEvents.title: Blood Donation Events
donationEvents.description: Join voluntary blood donation events to help save lives. Every drop you give can bring hope to someone in need.
donationEvents.searchPlaceholder: Search for events, locations, addresses, or cities...
donationEvents.noEventDescription: Try adjusting filters or search keywords

createEvent.description: Submit a request for a new blood donation campaign

error.event_hospital_min: Hospital/Location must be at least 3 characters

error.organizer_contactPersonName_max: Contact person name cannot exceed 100 characters

guideUnselected.title: How to register:
steps: 1. Select a time slot from the available options
2. Click the "Register for this time slot" button
3. You will receive a confirmation email
